outcome: All citizens’ BCI scores abruptly reset to zero, locking down nearly every service and paralyzing transit. Innovators push for emergency reforms, but chaos leads to citywide unrest and power struggles.

events.description: Millions abruptly lose access to transport, food, medical care, and digital systems as BCI scores drop to zero. Panic and confusion erupt citywide.
Crowds gather at council buildings, demanding answers. Innovators call for full manual override, while Directorate deploys emergency units to maintain order.
Rolling protests and looting break out as services remain partially offline. Innovator-backed engineers begin reconnecting key systems, bypassing council protocol.
Power struggles escalate within the Council. Some services are restored, but the city is split as rival factions each claim rightful oversight of the BCI.
